title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; drop-in replacement for OpenAI SDK to run local models via Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding helpers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper (fzf model picker, chat history, prompts library).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: LlamaIndex + Ollama for PDF Q&A with citations.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with one-line docker run for Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama locally and expose sensor/services for automations.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and streaming chat support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models in C#.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord with slash commands and conversation memory.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and streaming.
